As Bar Refaeli rung the opening bell of the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange on May 9th, the Under 30 Global Summit began. Over the next four days, hundreds of 30 Under 30 list members and celebrated mentors from around the world convened in Israel to learn, to explore and to found impactful collaboration.
